A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: People hate on this film because it’s not the same old\, good vs bad & plan to stop the bad guys and destroy their “Death Star”. It pushes expectations and takes risks. People only say they want change but didn’t like actually seeing it. Rian Johnson did a spectacular job. Mark Hamill preformed stunningly along with the rest of the cast. Much love for Carrie Fisher. Loved the visual effects\, various costumes\, creatures\, and the PORGS! LOVED THE PORGS! Even though it does feel different\, it’s probably the BEST since Episode V.
